channel.title: No
channel.description:
My real life friend ZwangahMonster was just banned for taking obsidian from the once abandoned city outside of my city, which I claimed and Moparisthebest confirmed that I was allowed to claim the city as mine. I gave my friend full permission to remove the obsidian so it is not griefing. In fact, when I am unbanned I will report whoever made any changes because the city belongs to me.
Do you guys like banning my family and friends from this server or something? I mean I know I have made a few mistakes, and my brother has as well, but he has left our main city once to collect obsidian and you ban him. This is not justifiable and you have no reason what so ever to ban him.

item.title: No
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:8, topic:400412”][quote author=Mr Mopar X link=topic=497477.msg3638250#msg3638250 date=1308760816]
Why are you posting, the problem is solved and this doesn’t involve you. Me and Krackkid own the city and we both agreed he should be unbanned. I reported your post as spam.
[/quote]
There is no rule against me posting and the urge to post suddenly fell upon me and before I knew it my fingers went aflying over my keyboard and my mouse clicked on the post button. Go ahead and report it as spam, I am not in any way spamming.

I have reported your post as spam.[/quote]

You do realize… that your post is spam…

[hr]

I’m glad everything got settled but I think this topic needs a lock now, take it up with the staff through PM. I’ll go find out who banned him.

Read full topic

Again, you’re all just mad you’re getting banned for breaking the rules and frankly if you don’t like it, you can go to another server. It’s not like the owners are begging you to stay.[/quote]
hey moparX isent mad thats hes banned hes mad that I’M banned FOR NOTHING i didnt know the city of taken or not the city had no signs or any activity! and i get banend for taking a obsidian portal with NO SIGNS OF ANY ACTIVITY!

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=497477.msg3637951#msg3637951 date=1308722760]

Well I am still banned for a day for stealing wheat crops, but I appreciate it. However, I am trying to get my friend unbanned for “griefing” the obsidian. He said he would be happy to rebuild the obsidian portal. I like when people get along, I really do.
[/quote]Fuck no he is still banned, That bastard can deal with it.

item.title: No
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’d like krackkid to say how Mr Mopar X or anyone else was supposed to know the town was yours if you didn’t log in or do anything for two weeks? Big brother doesn’t keep records that long, so if you didn’t have signs or similar, how could he have possibly known? Even if we had the residence plugin enabled before this, I’m going to set it up so you have to renew your ‘lease’ (your protected area) at least once a week or you lose it and it comes up for grabs.

Read full topic
